idea-plugin.name: Base16 ShadeSmear Dark
idea-plugin.vendor: Kyle Giammarco (http://kyle.giammar.co), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 ShadeSmear Dark for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Kyle Giammarco (http://kyle.giammar.co). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
